Description.Text: St Nicolas Elegant Residence is a modern 4-star hotel offering comfortable studio and apartment accommodation near the heart of Paphos. It boasts a restaurant, bar and four lagoon-style swimming pools. Chloraka Village is a quiet area situated within close proximity to Paphos town centre and the busy tourist area of The Tombs of the Kings. Nearby places of interest include Paphos Archaeological Park, Paphos Fort and Tala Village. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Pathos destinations. The hotel occupies numerous modern residential buildings. Facilities include four lagoon-style swimming pools, saunas, a heated indoor swimming pool, Jacuzzi, tennis court, gym, cinema, children's playground and beauty treatment rooms. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Studios are decorated in a modern style. They comprise a well-equipped kitchenette and a spacious sitting area. Amenities include a flat-screen TV, DVD player, air-conditioning and en-suite bathroom. The hotel offers a varied menu overlooking the pool. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. Free parking is possible onsite.
